bird_species = train['primary_label'].value_counts()[:20]
chart = px.bar(x =bird_species.index, y =bird_species.values,
                   labels = {"x": "Bird Species Name",
                             "y": "Count of Each Bird Species"},
                   title = "Count of Bird Species")
chart.show()
